input_args.passage: 'All the Light We Cannot See | All the Light We Cannot See, Anthony Doerr is the author of All the Light We Cannot See, winner of the Pulitzer Prize, the Andrew Carnegie Medal for Excellence, the Alex Award, and a Finalist for the National Book Award for Fiction., All the Light We Cannot See'
